text: The women's 800 metres event at the 2004 World Junior Championships in Athletics was held in Grosseto, Italy, at Stadio Olimpico Carlo Zecchini on 13, 14 and 16 July. ==Medalists== {| class="wikitable" style="text- align:center; " width="35%" |- |bgcolor="gold"|Gold|| Natalya Koreyvo ' |- |bgcolor="silver"|Silver|| Simona Barcău ' |- |bgcolor="CC9966"|Bronze|| Kay-Ann Thompson ' |} ==Results== ===Final=== 16 July {| class="wikitable sortable" style="text-align:center" |- !Rank !!
